message.content:
cs.NI, cs.RO, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.EMB

Reasoning: 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on the design and development of an IoT-based microfarm prototype which involves the use of sensors, microcontrollers, and a web database for remote monitoring and control of the farm.
- cs.RO (Robotics) is also a likely category as the paper involves the automation of the microfarm system through the use of parameter regulators such as LED growlight strips, water pump, and air cooler.
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is another likely category as the paper discusses the development of the Microfarm Companion application which allows the user to monitor and control the environmental parameters observed in the microfarm.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is a possible category as the paper involves the monitoring and control of environmental parameters in a closed system (microfarm) through the use of sensors and parameter regulators.
- cs.EMB (Embedded Systems) is also a possible category as the paper involves the design and development of an embedded system (IoT-based microfarm prototype) which utilizes sensors, microcontrollers, and parameter regulators for remote monitoring and control of the farm.
